data.text:
Everything was beyond expectations!
The stuff was very caring and helpful. They always made sure that everything is okay and that we have what we need. The room was clean, comfortable and modern.
The rooftop is breathtaking! The location is amazing!
About 7 minutes from plaça de Catalunya!!! It's my third time in Barcelona and my first time in this hotel and l'll be definitely going back there when i'm in Barcelona again!!
data.title: Beyond expectations

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Tehilac,

Thank you very much for your kind message and for choosing our hotel for your stay in Barcelona! We are very happy to know that we exceeded your expectations and that you enjoyed such a positive experience with us.
It is a real pleasure for our team to know that you felt well looked after and cared for during your stay. We strive to provide attentive and professional service, as well as to keep our facilities in optimal condition to ensure the comfort and satisfaction of our guests.
We are especially pleased to hear that you were impressed with the cleanliness, comfort and modernity of your room, as well as the breathtaking views from our rooftop terrace. Our privileged location is certainly a highlight that allows our guests to enjoy easy access to the city's main points of interest.
We are honored to receive your praise and know that you plan to return on your next visit to Barcelona. We would be delighted to welcome you back and to ensure that your next stay is equally memorable.
owner_response.author: Marjorie Grau

data.text: Read this: this hotel is perfect for a family visiting Barcelona. Quiet at night even on the weekends. Amazing restaurants near by. Free laundry on the 1st floor so you can pack less. Breakfast is great and the service in general is fantastic. Close to everything. Very safe. Don’t hesitate. Highly recommend for families!
data.title: Best hotel in Barcelona for a Family!

data.text:
Nice hotel in the perfect location. In walking distance to many local attraction. For further exploration, the metro station or bus stops are just stone's throw from the hotel. The staff at Yurbban Trafalgar were friendly, helpful, and always available to answer questions or offer recommendations (thank you Nuria for all your advise!).
The breakfast buffet was a delicious way to start the day with a selection of hot and cold options.
For those who need to stay connected, the Wi-Fi was fast and reliable throughout the hotel.
And after a long day of exploring, the rooftop terrace was perfect to relax and enjoy beautiful view of Barcelona skyline (there is a swimming pool as well...).
The comfortable accommodations, friendly staff, and convenient amenities make it a perfect base for exploring the city. I highly recommend it to any traveler looking for a delightful and hassle-free stay.
data.title: More than just location

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 665januszl,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay at Yurbban Trafalgar and that our hotel exceeded your expectations.

It's wonderful to know that you found our location convenient and that you were able to explore many local attractions within walking distance. We're glad you found our staff, especially Nuria, to be friendly, helpful, and accommodating. We will definitely pass along your kind words to her.

We're delighted that you enjoyed our breakfast buffet and found it to be a delicious way to start your day. Providing a variety of hot and cold options is important to us, and we're pleased to hear that you enjoyed it.

Ensuring fast and reliable Wi-Fi throughout the hotel is a priority for us, so we're glad that you found it satisfactory during your stay. Additionally, we're thrilled that you were able to unwind and enjoy the beautiful views of Barcelona skyline from our rooftop terrace, along with the swimming pool.

Thank you for recommending Yurbban Trafalgar to other travelers. We take great pride in providing delightful and hassle-free stays, and it's rewarding to hear that we achieved this during your visit.

We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future for another memorable stay.

Warm regards,

Yurbban Trafalgar Team
owner_response.author: Marjorie Grau

data.text:
Loved this hotel. Would absolutely recommend it! 

PROS
-The staff was so nice and knowledgeable 
- loved that you could book a taxi from the receptionist 
-Loved the water on tap in the lobby 
-clean room 

CONS
- the bathrooms are basically see through 
-the mini fridge was unplugged without any warning
data.title: Loved this hotel. Would absolutely recommend it!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words regarding your recent stay in Yurbban Trafalgar. 
We are very fortunate to have such wonderful people working with us day in and day out who genuinely love taking care of others. Thank you for letting us know about the issues that you experienced during your recent stay at our Thank you for your honest feedback. Your ideas, feedback, good news, and bad news are all extremely valuable in helping us improve and continue to grow. We are so happy that we had the opportunity to have you with us!
owner_response.author: Marjorie Grau

data.text: Really great hotel- the staff were lovely, great location, hotel is modern and clean. Lovely little rooftop and you can use the one next door too. The little extra surprises the hotel offers, such as cheese & wine was fantastic! Would recommend the rooms with a terrace or balcony, definitely worth the extra money!
data.title: Perfect hotel for a long weekend away!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you very much for your stunning review about your stay at Yurbban Trafalgar. I am delighted to know that you enjoyed our free Wine O'clock hour, as for us traveling means discovering a new culture, and that, naturally, includes food. We are glad you gave us such high remarks on our friendly service and the cleanliness of our rooms! I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us!
owner_response.author: Marjorie Grau
